mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BAN ( BAN_NUM, MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, BAN_REMOVAL_DATE, BAN_REASON, BAN_DATE ) VALUES( BAN_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MEM_ID}, #{MEM_NAME}, #{MEM_PHONE}, #{BAN_REMOVAL_DATE}, #{BAN_REASON}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT BAN_REMOVAL_DATE, BAN_REMOVAL_DATE-sysdate EXP_DATE FROM BAN WHERE MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}
